description: IPyOverlay is a Python library that provides several IPyWidget components for use within the Jupyter software ecosystem. These components add novel UI capabilities to enable details-on-demand interaction paradigms by providing the ability to render widgets on top of other widgets with arbitrary and controllable positioning. This capability enables adding click-and-draggable overlay windows containing other widgets, right-click context menus, and more complex tooltip functionality.
name: IPyOverlay
